tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeSchedules (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shift_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    shift_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Employee (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ShiftRotation (
    rotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rotation_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LeaveRequest (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    leave_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT REFERENCES Employee(employee_id),
  shift_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE LeaveRequest (
  request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT REFERENCES Employee(employee_id),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Leave_Request (
  request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);
